Section.Catchline: Financial support of Florida College System institutions.

Subsection.Text: Each Florida College System institution that has been approved by the Department of Education and meets the requirements of law and rules of the State Board of Education shall participate in the Florida College System Program Fund. However, funds to support workforce education programs conducted by Florida College System institutions shall be provided pursuant to s. 1011.80.

A student in a baccalaureate degree program approved pursuant to s. 1007.33 who is not classified as a resident for tuition purposes pursuant to s. 1009.21 may not be included in calculations of full-time equivalent enrollments for state funding purposes.
